summary: An email from attorney Jesse Mautner to an individual at the email address 'EMINIME' requesting assistance in identifying whether any photos recovered in the Epstein case depict his client, an unnamed woman who had interactions with Epstein. The email includes attached photos of the client from around the time of her interactions.

persons.name: Jesse Mautner
persons.context: Attorney from Merson Law, PLLC, who is reaching out on behalf of a client to request assistance in identifying her in photos recovered from the Epstein case.

persons.name: Ms.
persons.context: Unnamed female client of Jesse Mautner who had interactions with Jeffrey Epstein and is seeking to identify herself in photos recovered from the case.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The central figure in the case from whom a trove of photos was recovered; the client had interactions with him.

connections.description: Jesse Mautner is an attorney representing the unnamed female client, acting on her request to identify her in Epstein case photos.
The client had interactions with Jeffrey Epstein, as indicated by the reference to 'her interactions with Epstein'.

events.title: Recovery of Epstein Photos
events.description: A trove of photos was recovered in the Jeffrey Epstein case, which are being reviewed to identify individuals.

keyFacts: An attorney is seeking assistance to determine if his client appears in photos recovered from the Jeffrey Epstein case.
The client is an unnamed woman who had interactions with Jeffrey Epstein.
The attorney attached recent and contemporaneous photos of the client from around the time of her interactions with Epstein to aid in identification.
The correspondence highlights ongoing efforts to identify victims or associates from evidence in the Epstein case.
The email is marked as confidential and protected by attorney-client privilege.
